WorkItem.Description:
Hello, I am generating excel files (.xlsx) by using the version 1.7.5 of PHPExcel. for a file of 3.000 lines I have no problem, but for a query retrieving 5.000 lines it seems to generate the file but when it is downloading it and opening it the message "Excel cannot open the file 'xxx.xlsx'" because the file format or file extension is not valid. Verify that the file has not been corrupted and that the file extension matches the format of the file." Then when I am opening the Excel file with Wordpad, only the following message is present: "
Warning: fread() [function.fread]: Length parameter must be greater than 0 in ../PHPExcel/1.7.5/Classes/PHPExcel/CachedObjectStorage/PHPTemp.php on line 98

Fatal error: Call to a member function attach() on a non-object in ../PHPExcel/1.7.5/Classes/PHPExcel/CachedObjectStorage/PHPTemp.php on line 100
" Â  Any idea ?
WorkItem.Summary: fread(): Length parameter must be greater than 0
